ordersText.title: FAITHFUL ADVANCE
ordersText.general: While resolving this order, you may move up to 2 of your units through 1 uncontrolled world as if it were a friendly area. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: DIVINE DELIVERANCE
ordersText.general: When rolling dice during the preparation step of a combat you start with this order, roll 1 additional die for each Sister Repentia on the contested world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: LEAD THE RIGHTEOUS
ordersText.general: After you resolve this order, you may place 1 reinforcement token on a friendly world in the active system that contains a bastion and no reinforcement token. When this world becomes contested, this reinforcement token participates in combat, but is not treated as a unit during the reinforce step. If the bastion is destroyed outside of combat, return the reinforcement token to the supply. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: WAR BBQ
ordersText.general: During this orbital strike, gain 1 [D]. Before you resolve this orbital strike, if the combined morale of your ships participating in this orbital strike is higher than the combined morale of unrouted units and bastions on the world, force your opponent to rout 1 of his units. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: BRAZIER OF HOLY FIE
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike, you may rout any number of participating ships. For each ship you rout, convert up to 2 of your dice into [B]. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: UNDIVIDED FAITH
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* You may discard this card at the start of an execution round of combat. If you do, your routed units contribute half of their morale value, rounded up, to your total morale during the resolution step of this combat.

eventsText.title: HEROINE IN THE MAKING
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to move 1 Sister Repentia or 1 Battle Sister to an enemy world and start combat. While resolving this combat, resolve 1 execution round only and treat the chosen unit as a Living Saint. Destroy it after you resolve the combat.

eventsText.title: INDOMITABLE BELIEF
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* You may discard this card at the start of an execution round of combat. If you do, your units cannot become routed during this execution round.

eventsText.title: FAIT ACCOMPLI
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Before revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to take either 1 Sister Repentia or 1 Battle Sister from any world and place it on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: INVASION CATHEDRUM DEPLOYMENT
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free city on a friendly world not containing a structure or spend 3 materiel to place 1 free city on a friendly world not containing a city.

eventsText.title: CRUSADE INTO DARKNESS
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by 1 for each system containing both friendly and enemy areas. The reduction cannot exceed 3 materiel.

eventsText.title: INSPIRING ORATOR
eventsText.general: Either gain 1 reinforcement token or gain 1 reinforcement token for each friendly world containing a city.

eventsText.title: ULTIMATE DEVOTION
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free Battle Sister on a friendly world containing a unit or place 1 free Sister Repentia on any friendly world.

combatText.title: SENSUAL ALLURE
combatText.general: Your opponent must choose and rout 1 of his units.
combatText.unit: Seeker/Cruiser: Gain [M] equal to the highest command level among unrouted enemy units.

combatText.title: CORRUPTING INFLUENCE
combatText.general: Your opponent must give you one of his [D].
combatText.unit: Seeker/Cruiser: Discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

combatText.title: TRAITOROUS SOUL
combatText.general: Gain 1 (B) for each enemy command level 0 unit.
combatText.unit: Seeker: Replace 1 enemy command level 0 unit with a friendly command level 0 unit.

combatText.title: SONG OF SLAANESH
combatText.unit: Seeker/Cruiser: Gain 1 (B) for each [M] you have.

combatText.title: UNEXPECTED ALACRITY
combatText.general: Either steal 1 (B) or 1 (S) or gain 1 (B) or 1 (S).
combatText.unit: Seeker/Cruiser: Discard a combat card from your hand and resolve its unit abilities.

combatText.title: ACOUSTIC BARRAGE
combatText.unit: Noise Marine/Cruiser: Your opponent must rout 1 of his units or destroy all of his routed units.

combatText.title: BLISSFUL AGONY
combatText.general: Gain 1 (S) for each friendly routed unit.
combatText.unit: Noise Marine/Cruiser: Friendly units cannot become routed during the next assess damage step.

combatText.title: LURID VISIONS
combatText.unit: Noise Marine/Cruiser: Your opponent chooses and reveals a combat card from his hand. He must play that card in the next combat round.

combatText.title: SHRIEKING HAVOCS
combatText.general: Your opponent chooses for you to gain either 2 (B) or 2 (S).
combatText.unit: Noise Marine/Cruiser: Your opponent cannot rally units during this round of combat.

combatText.title: UNSPEAKABLE PERVERSION
combatText.unit: Seeker: Your opponent looses all reinforcement tokens. Place that many free reinforcement tokens in this area.

combatText.title: MUTUAL DESTRUCTION
combatText.general: Destroy a friendly unrouted unit to choose and destroy an enemy unit of the same or lower command level.
combatText.unit: Soul Grinder/Cruiser/Grand Cruiser: Gain (B) equal to the highest command level among unrouted friendly units.

combatText.title: REVEL IN MISERY
combatText.general: Rally all friendly and enemy units.
combatText.unit: Soul Grinder/Grand Cruiser: Gain 1 (B) or 1 (S) for each unit that was rallied as a result of the general ability of this card.

combatText.title: DIVINE BLESSING
combatText.general: Spend any number of [S] or [M]. For each [S] or [M] you spend, force your opponent to lose 1 [B].

combatText.title: DIVINE SMITING
combatText.general: Either gain 1 [M] or convert up to 2 of your dice into [M].
combatText.unit: Living Saint/Grand Cruiser: Gain 1 (B) for each [M] you have. *newline* During this execution round, none of the [B] are added to offence values.
